body_html:
@cy89
No, issue #17650 doesn't help. I'm now interested how does throttle secs of EvalSpec works in tf 1.10?

please, look at tensorflow logs when estimator start to train_and_evaluate in tf 1.9 and 1.10 (look my issue head). It was comfortable to control eval frequency with throttle_secs. Control with save_checkpoints_secs is very risky, when I want start eval process every epoch
